name: Twins (ZiweiZhang)
description:
Welcome to the magician’s magic lab! The naughty elves make a mess in the lab. They throw them magic item everywhere!  The Sorcerer apprentices,  the twins are upset about that. They also have special abilities that they can act together with their innate telepathic abilities. There are many magic organs in the lab, preventing magic items from stealing. There are dangerous traps, movable walls, power organ and arrow conveyor belts. The twins’ mission is to go over those magic organs to return the magic items back to their original place. 

Can you help the twins to complete their mission? Watch out! The twins may die because of your careless operation. But some interesting organs can also help you to return the magic items quickly and more conveniently! Please don’t destroy the precious magic items or “kill” the twins. Having fun with those magic organs!

Press ↑ ↓ ← → to move.

Made by Ziwei Zhang for IMS 445.
